title: Great Eastern Holdings 3Q Net Profit Fell
text:
By Justina Lee

Great Eastern Holdings Ltd.'s (G07.SG) net profit fell 4% on year in the third quarter, dragged by lower non-operating profit from its insurance business, it said Friday.

Net profit in the quarter was 205.1 million Singapore dollars ($150.4 million), the insurance-services company said. That compares with net profit of S$213.3 million in the same period last year.

Total income for the quarter fell to S$4.38 billion from S$4.87 billion a year ago.

Write to Justina Lee at justina.lee@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 24, 2019 20:48 ET (00:48 GMT)
